boardgame.name: Blokus Duo
Blokus Fast Fun!
Blokus To Go!
Travel Blokus
Vigor Blokus
boardgame.description: Travel Blokus is the smaller, 2-player verson of Blokus. It is an abstract strategy game with transparent, tetris-shaped, colored pieces that players are trying to play onto the board. The only caveat to placing a piece is that it may not lie adjacent to your other pieces, but instead must be placed touching at least one corner of your pieces already on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The tiles in the Blokus To Go version are made with square holes cut into them that allow them to be snapped onto square-shaped _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;nubs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; on the playing field. There are also two storage trays that hold the tiles for travel. These trays cover the board when the game is not being played and fold open in order for players to access the tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2005 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Japanese Game Nominee
2006 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee
2006 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Two-players
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: Divisible By Zero (DBZ) Aust Pty Ltd

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

never played +++++ german version, but game components are completely language independent and you can download rulers translations from boardgamegeek ++++++++++ could be send as an uninsured letter, please ask for prices +++++ and about insured shipment...international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren¬¥t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

The game: Winning Moves (c) 2005. German edition. All game materials are in very good condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL.
